ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to fetch the Role resource from.

Sid.description: The SID of the Role resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Role resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**permissions**: An array of the permissions the role has been granted.
**service_sid**: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) the Role resource is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Role resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Role resource.
